alert.note: Alert for Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 5:44AM EST until January 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Snow may change over to freezing rain during the afternoon Sunday. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches and a light glaze of ice possible. * WHERE...Southeast Randolph County. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Power outages will also be possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities will be reduced in moderate to heavy snowfall. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
